channel.title: Ubuntu Studio
channel.description:
A Multimedia based flavour of ubuntu aimed at Audio/Graphics/Video users.
http://ubuntustudio.org/ https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuStudio
Hope you can install KDE or they release kubuntustudio aswell though =]
Released tomorow or so i heard.
Get ready to download :)
Edit: sorry if i got your hopes up. it is now looking towards an end of april release =]
http://www.ubustu.com/globe/2007/04/14/ubuntu-studio-ardour2-screenshots/
